website_summaries.verdict: Hand embroidered and sequined, these quality stockings work for everyone in the family.
pros: Thick, soft, and roomy, these 18-inch stockings have a 7-inch opening to allow for larger gifts
The 3-packs also come in a range of other designs and colors
Will hold up for many seasons
cons: A couple of instances where the stockings arrived with some stains

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautiful when hanging!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stockings! I was really impressed with the thickness of the fabric and the quality of the product overall. They are really nice stockings for the price and will be used year after year. They are roomy so you can fit plenty of stuff in them... we like to "stuff" our stockings to the brim. Highly recommend these if you're looking for a subtle plaid with the trendy deer featured. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: CMCollins3

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good (Mostly)
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed when I opened these and the white one was already dirty. I cleaned off the spot, but you can still tell if you’re looking closely. That being said, I feel like these are worth what you pay. They look great hanging up. We wanted a set that matched, but weren’t identical. So far they are just hanging without anything in them, but I can’t see there being any problems when we do put something in them.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, but our local stores were out of stockings and needed a few stockings for visitors over the holiday. I was very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute & Nicely Made
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I’m so glad I bought these , they are so cute. Even my husband likes them . I was going to spend $40 on 3 from target & figured why not try these for only $25. They are nicely made and I just love em. I didn’t fill them up yet but I’m sure they’ll support what I stuff them with. I recommend these instead of spending $40+ on other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: Great fleecy material with quality appliques and could hold quite ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these at the last minute for some holiday decoration, and they were absolutely darling. Great fleecy material with quality appliques and could hold quite a few little stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: A perfect pair!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable for our furry babies. A fabulous matching set to add to our new decore this year! Very soft & cute! Simple design, not cluttered or over the top! Just perfect! Now if we could get the cat & dog to get along this well, I’d have a perfect pair ;)
customer_reviews.author: J&B

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric and long lasting !
customer_reviews.text: I have three girls so wanted three nice stockings that could last through the years. I went on a limb and ordered these and am so pleased! So soft and thick, amazing quality, and just different enough to suit all three of my girls. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, perfect for the penguin lover in your family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister because she comes to my house to celebrate Christmas and I did not realize how perfect it would be. She loves penguins and they are super cute on this stocking. Plus it is made out of a soft felt like material which just adds to its cuteness. Not sure how well it holds up over time because I just bought it a month ago or so but it's been hanging up since Thanksgiving with a few bath bombs, bubble bath and candies and it still looks sound.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Cute but needed adjustment
customer_reviews.text: The stockings came and were of good quality material and so cute. One issue though. For some reason one of the stockings had the loop that hangs it on the wrong side. I had to ask somebody to fix that so it would hang the same as the others
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cute stocking for our babies first Christmas and this one is perfect! It was much thicker then I thought it would be and the quality is excellent. I’m so excited to be able to use this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Even cuter in person..Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Even cuter in person. Excellent quality. Nice, sturdy thick material. Everyone commented on how much they loved the stocking. I also like that there’s space to write kitty’s name on it. Can’t do that with many of the pet stockings. It was our kitty’s first Christmas. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: PhantomLover

customer_reviews.title: Cute, good quality stockings
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my 3-year-old twin granddaughters. Delivered on time and in great condition. Very cute. A little larger than what I expected, but still fine. Will be used for many years, I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Edwina Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stocking for my mum, as she needs a new one. Very cute and am absolutely in love with it. Feels like good quality, just a little smaller than expected. But I love it so much that it won't affect it's rating. I'm tempted to get one for myself because it's so adorable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All set for the holidays now.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and price. Nice and soft. Been looking for sometime for xmas stockings for my fur babies. Glad I chose these.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Johnsrud

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait till Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to have them embroidered with names and hang them on my fireplace this Christmas. Wish I had bought them sooner. Great product- well made!
customer_reviews.author: soo h

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super great quality. Bought for my daughter. Super cute. We have been wanting customized stockings and she loves cats.
customer_reviews.author: JESSIDBEST

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are great. They seem like they’re made of quality material and are the perfect size for what we wanted. I can see these lasting a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, thick and soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely high quality stockings! They are very pretty and thick and soft! Very roomy - can fit a lot of stuff in there <3

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Daddy, Mommy, daughter...perfect for our family of three...fits each of our personalities! Ironing our names with felt lettering today to personalize...great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie1208

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful expensive looking stockings with sparkly details. It's hard to find stockings with glittery details that look luxe and these were great.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stocking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my future granddaughter. it is very pretty. It is also well made.

customer_reviews.title: Will use again
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal and they are so cute. My children absolutely loved these. 3 in a package for less than 25 not bad.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Cat Stocking
customer_reviews.text: I found this stocking super cute. It's our first Christmas with our adopted cat. I only have 4 stars because even though it was double wrapped in plastic, it will still had little dirty spots on the top left of stocking. It is easily be hidden since it's on the back, but still.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Soft, beautiful and is great for your money
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are so soft and so beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Snowman Stocking
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful stocking! The stitching is perfect and the design is so cute. This is an excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F

customer_reviews.title: Such good quality! its so soft and fluffy my 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Such good quality! its so soft and fluffy my 3 year old wanted to sleep with it instead of hanging it up for Santa

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Excellently made, colorful, easy to use, perfect size for out 80 lb dog-fit plenty of treats for holiday celebration.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time before Christmas and was exactly what I expected. Saw similar product without designs (plain red or white) at walgreens for $12 each. Bought these and they are of the same quality. Didn't find anything at Walmart. My wife and I however have different taste and that did not go over too well.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT... worth it
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect... colors matches the color of my home 😊😊😊😊

customer_reviews.title: owls) which was creepily perfect for my mom and grandparents
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of 3 (penguins, reindeer, owls) which was creepily perfect for my mom and grandparents. The stockings are super nice in person. Very impressed. They are average sized and easy to label. I got iron on letters for 2 of 3 and they turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cute and spacious!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and held a lot of stocking stuffers. It is exactly as pictured and the set is a great price for all 3 stockings.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved them!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and thick. I had my grandkids names engraved on them. Bigger than I thought they would be so I have to buy more stocking stuffers to fill them up. Merry Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: Good Christmas Stockings
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed with the quality of these stockings. They are thick, very soft and I’m surprised they didn’t cost more.

customer_reviews.title: Cat-tastic!! 😊

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable! I purchased these because they come in ...

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Dirt Marks that Caused Permanent Damage
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are really cute and soft. Although, one of them had about 5 brown dirt marks around the top. Wiping them with a cloth partially removed them but also permanently changed the texture and appearance of the stocking. Very dissapointed the item would arrive dirty and is now wrecked in those spots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plush stocking, very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My son purchased this for our dog, who really is a polar bear (great pyranees) and it's perfect for her! The quality of the stocking was really nice, I wish I had purchased more designs from this manufacturer for the whole family instead of the cheaper set I bought for the rest of us. Yes, there I said it - my dog has the best looking stocking on the fireplace, the rest pale in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: shopRAVE

customer_reviews.title: Cutest. Stockings. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these stockings! They are so cute, soft and very well made. I cannot tell you how many stockings I've purchased over the years, but this set is everything! I love them so much that I had them personalized immediately (I've never done that before). They will last me for years! If you're considering them, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: WarpedMind

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I originally purchased a set of 3 2 years ago but we have a new baby coming this year so I needed to get another one, I’m so glad that there’s an option to just purchase 1 piece only and it’s still available after few years. It’s so soft and they have cute designs. Cons: Limited designs to choose from(almost too girly); it could have been cheaper for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Thorpius Maximus

customer_reviews.title: My wife is Thrilled!

And the best part is my wife loves it! This feels like it is made of quality material and its a good size. I attached a photo with my hand to show you relative size.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my kids. My daughter loves cats and I have a baby boy so it was perfect! The stockings are actually pretty soft and I didn't find any flaws. Santa stuffed them pretty full and they were able to hold a lot. I can see these lasting for many Christmases. Both my kids and myself are really happy!

customer_reviews.title: very cute!

customer_reviews.title: Cute and we love them!

customer_reviews.title: adorable and perfect.

They're still great quality and have held up nicely after being stored. the are great quality, thick material. penguins are perfection. they hold up well when i filled them up with goodies. amaing quality for the price. i will be getting more as the family grows!

customer_reviews.title: Cute, well made, and a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was wary because of the price but these stockings are perfect for my three young children! Large enough and I can tell they will hold up. The designs are adorable and well crafted!

customer_reviews.title: Great price, better quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love!! Beautiful quality! These were incredibly affordable, arrived quickly, and are just as pretty as I hoped they would be. I have a vinyl cutter and heat press and used those to put our names on them and the vinyl adhered great and the high heat didn’t affect the color or texture of the stockings at all.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I expected to receive stockings that were mediocre, at best. I was pleasantly surprised to find these are constructed from heavy duty fabrics and are pieces together rather well! I couldn’t be more pleased with my purchase!

product_meta.title: BambooMN 3 Pcs Set 18" Classic Hand Embroidered Sequined Cute Animal Christmas Stocking, Assortment 96
feature_bullets: DECORATIVE XMAS STOCKING 3 Pcs Set, 18" Classic Hand Embroidered Sequined Cute Animal Christmas Stocking, Assortment 96
THICK AND WELL MADE Christmas Stocking are thick and made well out of good material The animal patterns are hand-embroidered
BIG ENOUGH TOP PORTION There is enough room at the top of the stockings to have them embroidery with names
BEAUTIFUL HOLIDAY DECORATIONS These are the perfect sets of Chrismas Stockings to hang around your house this Christmas!
